ISSUE.TITLE: Builds succeeding with errors
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In the latest 0.3 (now on master) The docker publish plugin fails but the build is still reported as success. $ git checkout -qf 6fa908e5832a6722e6b3c5621de4e8abf40946f8 Docker Plugin: Missing argument(s) ``` docker_port not defined in yaml ``` $ exit 0

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: [code-886]: fix text in import space form (#592)
